input_text:
Job Title: Co-op, Electrical Engineering- Controls (On-site)

Location: Orange County, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Insulet started in 2000 with an idea and a mission to enable our customers to enjoy simplicity, freedom and healthier lives through the use of our Omnipod® product platform. In the last two decades we have improved the lives of hundreds of thousands of patients by using innovative technology that is wearable, waterproof, and lifestyle accommodating.

We are looking for highly motivated, performance driven individuals to be a part of our expanding team. We do this by hiring amazing people guided by shared values who exceed customer expectations. Our continued success depends on it!

Job Title: Equipment Engineering Co-op: Controls Engineering

Department: Global Equipment Engineering - Acton

FLSA Status: Non-exempt

Position Overview

The Global Equipment Engineering team is focused on supporting Insulet’s manufacturing operations in our new state of the art high speed automated manufacturing facility in Acton, MA. The assembly lines consist of discrete islands of automation. To support bringing these discrete component assembly lines to life and sustain manufacturing, comprehensive support and improvements of all the PLC, HMI, AIV (Autonomous Intelligent Vehicle), robotic and vision software is necessary. Some development, assembly and validation of measurement circuitry for connection to PLCs and test systems is also necessary to provide control signals to and from automation components. This candidate will work closely with the engineering team and Operations team to design and develop controls and software solutions to existing issues, vet new designs and create a means to deliver Insulet’s new products pipeline.

Ideal candidate has experience and interest in engineering equipment automation, lab testing, instrumentation and metrology.

Responsibilities

The successful coop will support lead electrical engineers in the support and improvement of manufacturing lines.

Support And Improvement Will Include The Following

logic to sequence the operation of the equipmentmotion control to move mechanisms with servo motors, VFDs, and robotsuser interface features to allow operations and manufacturing to view the equipment function and performanceinspection logic to check and measure the product components at various stages of assemblydata collection of equipment performance and product process variables, this may include data mining of informationAIV support, troubleshooting and improvement of present system

Also required is collaboration with the mechanical engineering team during mechanical design reviews and equipment build inspections.

COOP Job Focus

To support and develop controls for the production of Insulet’s Omnipod product. The successful coop will learn, assist and deliver in the following areas:

Imaging system support and improvement. This training and support will include imaging systems across the lineABB robotic support: teaching, fault recovery & improvementsPLC code support and improvement (Rockwell CompactLogix)AIV Support and improvements

Education And Experience

Minimum Requirements:

Enrolled as BS candidate in EE

Physical Requirements (if Applicable)

Possible travel required to automation supplier in Canada

NOTE: This position requires on-site working (requires on-site office/plant/lab work).  

Additional Information

The US base salary range for this full-time position is $23.00 - $31.25. Our salary ranges are determined by role, level, and location. The range displayed on each job posting reflects the minimum and maximum target for new hire salaries for the position in the primary work location in the US. Within the range, individual pay is determined by work location and additional factors, including job-related skills, experience, and relevant education or training. Your Talent Acquisition Specialist can share more about the specific salary range for your preferred location during the hiring process. Please note that the compensation details listed in US role postings reflect the base salary only, and do not include bonus, equity, or benefits.

At Insulet Corporation all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or status as a protected veteran.

(Know Your Rights)

Experience Level (if available): Director
